answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found a number of examples of brochures from different types of state associations.
The link below goes to the most recent advertising brochure for the Virginia Hospitality and Travel Association.
http://www.vhta.org/displaycommon.cfm?an=1&subarticlenbr=123
You can view the Pennsylvania State Association of Burroughs Training brochures.
http://www.boroughs.org/training/links.php
I have also included the North Carolina Nurses Association membership brochure.
http://www.ncnurses.org/Membership_Brochure_NCNA_Dec2007.pdf
This link goes to list of brochures from the Iowa State Association of Counties.
http://www.iowacounties.org/News/Publications%20Information/Brochures/Brochures.htm
I hope these are helpful!
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Christopher Anderson
text:
I'm looking for any brochures or promotional materials that state associations have created for recruitment purposes, or to promote the profession.  If you have these type of materals, could you email or mail to me?  I can be contacted at ctyadm@cconline.net  
Thank you for any assistance you can provide!
title: State Association Brochures / Promotional Materials
